Package ch.pschatzmann.stocks.accounting

Class Portfolio

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.pschatzmann.stocks.accounting.Portfolio
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Portfolio
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Stock Portfolio information for a specific date. We provide summarize information at a specific date for a each individual stocks which was held at any point of time.
    Author:
    pschatzmann
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Portfolio​(IAccount ta, java.util.Date date)
      Basic first constructor which connects the portfolio with the account
      Portfolio​(IAccount ta, java.util.Date date, Portfolio prior)
      We setup the protfolio for a new date as a copy of the information of the prior date.
